articles.title: Congratulations to UK PM
articles.content:
Congratulations to UK PM
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a congratulatory message to Theresa May on July 15 on her appointment as prime minister of the UK.
					 The message wished May success in her work for the country's development, hoping that the relations between the two countries would grow strong in mutual interests.
					
					 On the same day, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a congratulatory message to Boris Johnson on his appointment as foreign minister of the UK.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Hits Presidential Statement of Asia-Europe Meeting Summit
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Hits Presidential Statement of Asia-Europe Meeting Summit
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Sunday as regards the recent presidential statement of the Asia-Europe Meeting summit accusing the DPRK:
					 The 11th Asia-Europe Meeting (ASEM) summit held on Saturday made public a presidential statement terming the DPRK's bolstering of nuclear deterrent a violation of UNSC "resolutions" and a threat to the regional and global peace and security, pulling up the DPRK for no ground.
					
					 This is a reckless act of further aggravating the situation of the Korean peninsula by taking advantage of the U.S. extreme anti-DPRK racket.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. that creates a hair-trigger nuclear war danger on the Korean peninsula and wrecks peace and security in the region and the rest of the world.
					
					 The U.S. is now introducing into south Korea nuclear submarines, formations of strategic bombers and other strategic nuclear strike means and latest war hardware including THAAD one after another while ceaselessly staging nuclear war exercises for aggression to bring the dark clouds of a nuclear war to the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Besides, it has sought to encroach upon the sovereignty and vital rights of the DPRK and isolate and stifle it. Not content with such attempt, it has recently got hell-bent on unprecedented sanctions and pressure on the DPRK, daring hurt the dignity of its supreme leadership.
					
					 It is a legitimate measure for self-defence to cope with the ever-escalating U.S. frantic hostile policy and nuclear threat that the DPRK secured powerful nuclear deterrent and has bolstered it up both in quality and quantity.
					
					 Growing stronger is the will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to totally smash the U.S. and other hostile forces' high-handed and arbitrary practices and military pressure with the toughest counteraction.
					
					 The DPRK will invariably advance straight along the road of independence, Songun and socialism, regardless of what others say, and fight for genuine international justice as an independent power and nuclear power.

articles.title: Pyongyang Orphans' Secondary School Completed
articles.content:
Pyongyang Orphans' Secondary School Completed
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- There took place an inaugural ceremony of Pyongyang Orphans' Secondary School on Monday.
					 It has a school building with multi-function classrooms put on IT basis, labs and practice rooms, gymnasium with swimming pool, hostel, management building, etc. Provided with all conditions to convenience of the study and life of the orphans, the school meets the educational requirements on the highest level.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, Kim Su Gil, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, Cha Hui Rim, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, officials, teachers and students of the school, officials of the party and power bodies and relevant units, working people and builders in Pyongyang.
					
					 Kim Su Gil, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, made an inaugural speech.
					
					 He said that Pyongyang Orphans' Secondary School is the splendid palace, cradle of happiness for orphans, which has been built thanks to the fatherly love of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un personally guided the layout of the school so that it might be built as a model of the nation's schools and solved all the problems arising in the construction, the speaker said.
					
					 He stressed the need for the teaching staff of the school to devote themselves to the orphans with conscience as educators and bring up the students to be pillars of prosperous Korea who are knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants went round various places of the school.

articles.title: Film Show Held to Mark Kim Il Sung's Visit to Mongolia
articles.content:
Film Show Held to Mark Kim Il Sung's Visit to Mongolia
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A film show took place at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Monday to mark the 60th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's visit to Mongolia.
					 It was attended by Pak Kyong Il, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and chairman of the DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Association, members of the association, Pyongyangites.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Lombo Khash-Erdene, charge d'affaires ad interim, and staff members of the Mongolian Embassy here.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The participants watched the Korean documentary "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Meets with Heads and Prominent Figures of Foreign States" Part 1.

articles.title: Art Performance of KPA Officers' Wives Given
articles.content:
Art Performance of KPA Officers' Wives Given 
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- An art performance was given by the amateur art groups of units of the Korean People's Army (KPA) selected in the sixth round of the second-term art performance contest of KPA officers' wives at the People's Palace of Culture Sunday.
					 Among the audience were creators, artistes, teachers and students in the field of literature and arts.
					
					 Put on the stage were narration and chorus "Glory to General Kim Jong Un", instrumental music and song "Our Dear Marshal", chorus "We'll Travel One Road Forever" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the ideological and moral world of the KPA officers' wives faithfully upholding the cause of the Workers' Party of Korea with yearning and reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They fully proved that no force on earth can block the road of all the service personnel and people dashing ahead like wind in the spirit of blizzard of Paektu under the guidance of Kim Jong Un and that they are sure to win the final victory.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 It continues.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Individual stamps were issued in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Among them are stamps carrying the panoramic view of the Pyongyang Rest Home for the Aged and pine, the national tree of the DPRK.
					
					 There are also stamps showing several men and women and children in national costumes dating back to the Three Kingdoms (early 3rd century B.C.-middle 7th century A.D.), the Koryo Kingdom (918-1392) and the Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910).
					
					 They include three stamps dealing with such medical plants as Ligularia fischeri.

articles.title: Loving Care Shown for War Veterans
articles.content:
Loving Care Shown for War Veterans
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A sanatorium for veterans of the Fatherland Liberation War is now under construction at the foot of scenic Mt. Ryongak in Pyongyang, the capital city of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The sanatorium will be equipped with wading pool, barbershop, bathroom, massage room, fitness and amusement rooms, infirmary and others.
					
					 Such sanatoriums are to be built in each province of the country, thanks to a measure taken by the Workers' Party of Korea which cares so much for war veterans.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il in his lifetime said that to respect the war veterans is a tradition of the Korean revolution that emerged victorious with arms, as well as noble mental and moral traits of our society.
					
					 Under his deep care, a national conference of war veterans was convened and war heroes could work as lecturers at the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum. And military parades would take place with participation of war veterans on holidays.
					
					 Also, it became a trend of society in the country to treat war veterans with hospitality and take warm care of their life.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un has shown loving care for the war veterans, saying that all of them are heroes and revolutionary forerunners.
					
					 He made sure that July 27 was celebrated significantly as the day of war victory every year. And he enjoyed an art performance together with the war veterans participating in a national conference and had a photo session with them.
					
					 Under his guidance, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery were built as edifices to inherit the heroic fighting spirit displayed by the KPA soldiers during the war.

articles.title: DPRK Pays Big Efforts to Developing Marine Resources
articles.content:
DPRK Pays Big Efforts to Developing Marine Resources 
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A work for conserving and developing the marine resources goes on under a long-term plan in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
					 According to Kwak Il Hwan, secretary of the DPRK Marine Society, a series of measures were taken to increase marine resources and one of them is to install large-sized artificial fish banks.
					
					 A project is now making headway to create fishing grounds around coastal areas with the installation of artificial fish banks.
					
					 Meanwhile, signal successes have been made in developing and utilizing the marine natural energy.
					
					 A broad vista was opened to develop a large-scale underground ultra-saline water deposit and a progress was made in improving the system of marine observation, analysis and information service.
					
					 Researches into the survey of marine minerals are going on in full scale.
					
					 It is an important policy of the Workers' Party of Korea to conserve and increase the marine resources and make an effective use of them.

articles.title: KCNA Slams Japan for Denying Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
KCNA Slams Japan for Denying Its Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Germany finished the first-stage project for joint edition of the history textbook which has been pressed ahead with Poland since 2006 and held a book-releasing ceremony of Vol. 1 of the textbook dealing with the periods up to the Middle Ages.
					 The two countries decided to wind up the joint edition of the textbook dealing with the modern history by 2020.
					
					 Germany jointly edited the history textbook dealing with the periods after the Second World War with France and is editing the textbook dealing with the European history during the periods before the 20th century.
					
					 These developments go to prove that Germany which inflicted the untold misfortune and pain upon other European countries through two world wars is striving to liquidate its inglorious past and promote reconciliation with its neighboring countries and ensure peace in Europe.
					
					 On the contrary, Japan which imposed tremendous damage and sufferings upon the Asian people in the last century is getting more frantic in its moves to distort history, far from making an apology and reparation for its past crimes.
					
					 Japan's behavior is quite different from Germany's one.
					
					 Japan is now openly distorting history to deny its past crimes and justify them in the eyes of the world and getting more frantic in its moves for reinvasion to repeat its crime-woven history.
					
					 In last December, Japan concluded a deceptive "agreement" on the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army with the south Korean puppet forces with a petty amount of money in a bid to twist the essence of the issue of the sexual slavery a proper solution of which is demanded by the world and evade the responsibility for its hideous crimes.
					
					 Not content with this, Japan kicked up much fuss, distributing the book which totally denies the sexual slavery among scholars across the world and letting the foreign ministry open to public a document which claims that "no evidence proving the forcible drafting of the comfort women by the Japanese army or under the control of the state has been confirmed".
					
					 In the so-called "statement issued in last August seven decades since Japan's defeat from the Pacific War", the present ruling forces openly clarified their criminal stand that there should be no apology for the past history, asserting that "Japan should not oblige the postwar generations to make an apology as they had nothing to do with the war ".  Of late, they invited the U.S. president, their master, to visit Hiroshima in an effort to justify Japan's despicable history of crimes before the world and paint it as a "victim." 
					
					 By shamelessly working to distort history the Japanese reactionaries seek to implant militarism into all fabrics of the Japanese society and thus create a climate favorable for realizing their ambition for reinvasion.
					
					 It was against the backdrop of the mounting campaign for distorting history in Japan that the new security legislation was put into force in Japan to pave the way for launching a war of aggression and to further step up arms buildup for reinvasion.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' moves for distorting history are, indeed, a blatant challenge to the desire of mankind for peace and security and criminal acts that deserve denunciation.
					
					 The Japanese ruling quarters are sadly mistaken if they calculate they can realize their ambition for reinvasion through such ridiculous campaign as that for tampering with history.
					
					 History teaches that those who fail to feel ashamed of their wrong past and draw a lesson from it and those who are keen to dominate the world by invading other nations are bound to meet ruin without exception.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to stop acting recklessly, bearing in mind that its wrong attitude to cover up its past crimes only precipitates its self-ruin.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises DPRK as Politically and Ideologically Powerful Country
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises DPRK as Politically and Ideologically Powerful Country
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK is a politically and ideologically powerful country as it is great by dint of ideology, mighty by force of unity and dignified with independence, says Rodong Sinmun in an article on Monday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is a traditional leading mode of the Party to carry out the revolution and construction by dint of ideology, holding fast to it.
					
					 The two revolutionary wars, rehabilitation and construction, social revolution of the two stages and other struggles which were decisive in victory and defeat and the destiny of the revolution and the hard days in which the country made an untrodden path of history were the course of ideological campaign through which it has advanced by force of the inexhaustible strength and tremendous mental power of the people, giving priority to the ideological factors.
					
					 Even the vicious ideological and cultural poisoning by the imperialists to block the DPRK from advancing and make the revolutionary ranks degenerate could not shake the firm faith of all its service members and other people.
					
					 The course covered by the Workers' Party of Korea is a shining one as it has realized the unity of all the party members and all the people in thinking, purpose, morality and sense of obligation and won only victories on the basis of the revolutionary idea of the leaders.
					
					 Thanks to the mother party's politics of love for the people and benevolent politics, the trust of the popular masses in the party has been all the more consolidated, the political stability of society all the more ensured and the political and ideological foundation consolidated even during the days of the worst ordeals in history.
					
					 It is the consistent revolutionary mode of the party to solve all the issues arising in the revolution and construction its own way to meet the independent requirements and interests of the people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S. Assertion Related to THAAD Deployment in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S. Assertion Related to THAAD Deployment in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is misleading the public opinion that the DPRK's access to various kinds of rockets pose a "serious threat" to the security of south Korea and Asia-Pacific and, therefore,  the decision on the THAAD deployment in south Korea is an "inevitable option" to cope with it.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary terms this the height of profound confusing of right and wrong. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The THAAD deployment in south Korea is a direct product of the U.S. sinister ambition to maintain its military hegemony in Asia-Pacific.
					
					 The aggressive pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy sought by the U.S. is aimed to establish military domination over the Korean peninsula and, furthermore, outstrip China and Russia militarily.
					
					 The main purpose of the THAAD deployment is to contain and militarily hold down the surrounding countries in Northeast Asia by forming the Asian version of NATO with the alliance of the U.S., Japan and south Korea as the principal axis.
					
					 The peace and security are seriously threatened on the Korean peninsula and in the region owing to the U.S. THAAD deployment in south Korea with a nuclear war fast coming into a reality. 
					
					 The U.S. is working hard to turn the peninsula into the ground of thermonuclear war, obsessed with the anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK and absurd strategy to dominate the world, but it is no more than a daydream.
					
					 The DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to the U.S. desperate moves to turn the peninsula into the holocaust of a nuclear war.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Assails S. Korean Puppet Forces' Saber-rattling
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Assails S. Korean Puppet Forces' Saber-rattling
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers recently staged a combined drill of the marine corps together with the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in Phohang area of North Kyongsang Province.
					 Under the fire-cover of fighters, helicopter gunships and various type artillery pieces the rapid task force of the marine corps of south Korea together with the U.S. marines stationed in Okinawa conducted a landing operation aboard those copters and armored cars under the simulated conditions of seizing key facilities of the enemy.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The aim of the drill was to hasten the preparations for mounting surprise attack on the key facilities of the DPRK from the coast and ignite a war against it.
					
					 This goes to clearly prove that the scenario of the warlike forces at home and abroad to unleash a war against the north by challenging its peace-loving efforts has reached an extremely reckless phase.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is a herd of disturbers of peace and traitors that should not be allowed to go scot-free as they are getting ever more desperate in their moves to ignite a nuclear war, escalating tension in collusion with outside forces, not content with having driven the north-south relations to the worst catastrophe.
					
					 The puppet group's such muscle flexing as combined drill of the marine corps with the U.S. is as foolish an act as jumping into flames to perish there.
					
					 The aggressors will not have any opportunity to set foot on the inviolable territory of the DPRK.
					
					 The defence line of the DPRK safeguarded by the matchless revolutionary Paektusan army is like an impregnable fortress.
					
					 The DPRK will mercilessly beat back the military provocations of the puppet group to prolong their remaining days, backed by the U.S.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Illegally Detaining DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Illegally Detaining DPRK Citizens
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The Bar Association for Democratic Society of south Korea criticized the authorities for illegally detaining the DPRK citizens after alluring and abducting them in group, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 In a petition submitted to the "Human Rights Commission" on July 12 the association noted that it became hard to expect a fair court trial as regards the detained women employees of the north. 
					
					 The association called for looking into whether keeping the women employees of the north in the "center for protecting inhabitants defected from the north" in custody for a long time is in line with law.

articles.title: Murders Rampant in S. Korea
articles.content:
Murders Rampant in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Such monstrous crimes as offspring's killings of their mothers are rampant in south Korea, according to MBC of south Korea.
					 On July 7 a man living in Kangbuk District of Seoul beat his old mother to death simply because it was hard for him to care for her.
					
					 A similar case was reported from Anyang, Kyonggi Province on the same day.

articles.title: S. Korean Religious Body Says No to THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Korean Religious Body Says No to THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Roman Catholic Church voiced opposition to the regime's decision to deploy THAAD on July 15, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 THAAD deployment will not help preserve peace on the Korean peninsula but spark a new Cold War, the church noted, expressing concern over it.
					
					 Urging the regime to drop the calculation that arms buildup would defuse tensions and bring peace on the Korean peninsula, the church said THAAD deployment can never be justified.
					
					 THAAD deployment would only becloud the prospect of north-south cooperation and dialogue and aggravate tensions and hostility with neighboring countries, the church said, adding it would worsen the people's living and increase economic unrest.
					
					 Noting peace can be achieved only through north-south reconciliation and cooperation, not by force, it urged the regime to reexamine the issue of THAAD deployment.

articles.title: S. Korean Papers Slam Park Geun Hye for Suppressing Public Protest against Deployment of THAAD
articles.content:
S. Korean Papers Slam Park Geun Hye for Suppressing Public Protest against Deployment of THAAD
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- South Korean papers editorially denounced traitor Park Geun Hye for suppressing the public protest against the deployment of THAAD on July 15.
					 Kyunghyang Daily News in an editorial recalled that there is social chaos because of the decision on the deployment of THAAD.
					
					 The "government" is claiming that the deployment of THAAD makes it possible to protect "the security of the people" but it is sophism and mockery of the people, the editorial said.
					
					 The south Korean paper Hangyore said in an editorial the claim that the deployment of THAAD neither adversely affect the health of the local residents nor damage the crops has not been verified at all.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Discloses Inequality of Agreement on Sharing Upkeep of U.S. Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Discloses Inequality of Agreement on Sharing Upkeep of U.S. Forces
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Oh My News on July 3 in an article disclosed the inequality and illegality of the special agreement on sharing the upkeep of the U.S. forces, according to the south Korea-U.S. "Status of Forces Agreement" (SOFA).
					 The article said that all the agreements on the military affairs with the U.S. are unequal, but the above-said special agreement is symbolic of the unequal treaties between south Korea and the U.S.
					
					 It cited concrete facts about how south Korea consented to offering facilities and areas to U.S. forces free.
					
					 Noting that upkeep is paid for the stockpiling and managing shells of the U.S. Pacific Air Force and maintenance of aircraft under the U.S. Pacific Military Command, the article said in this respect the special agreement runs counter to peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 It demanded a ban on the implementation of the agreement and abrogation of the unequal SOFA.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Slams Park Geun Hye Regime for Giving Full Rein to Japan's Rearmament.
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Slams Park Geun Hye Regime for Giving Full Rein to Japan's Rearmament.
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Civic organizations in Taejon region of south Korea on July 13 held a Wednesday meeting before the girl statue for peace in Taejon calling for the right solution to the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and peace on the Korean peninsula, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 At the meeting, the speakers said that Japan has become ever more undisguised in its moves to revise the Pacifist Constitution, adding that it is a matter of time that Japan may emerge a war country any time.
					
					 At a time when Japan is becoming ever more undisguised in its moves to revive militarism, the Park Geun Hye regime shut its eyes to the Japanese imperialists' criminal colonial domination through the humiliating "agreement" on the sexual slavery, far from condemning it, they said.
					
					 They said they could not repress the bitter resentment at the officials concerned of the Defense Ministry who took part in the event commemorating the founding of Japan "Self-Defense Forces" held in the heart of Seoul, denouncing the regime for giving full rein to Japan's rearmament. 
					
					 The grudge of the victims can be settled only when the Japanese government admits the crimes and makes an official apology for them, they noted, adding that the humiliating "agreement" is totally null and void and renegotiations should be held in order to meet the demands of the victims.

articles.title: Workers in Ulsan, S. Korea Declare General Strike
articles.content:
Workers in Ulsan, S. Korea Declare General Strike
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Workers of Ulsan affiliated to the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) declared a large-scale general strike, according to the south Korean newspaper Nodong and Segye.
					 The July 20 general strike is to be waged by more than 27 500 workers under the KCTU in protest against the Park Geun Hye group's restructuring, retrogressive revision of the labor law and crackdown upon the unions.
					
					 The KCTU held a press conference on the general strike in Ulsan on July 14.
					
					 It said in its press release that the general strike of the workers in Ulsan on July 20 will be staged together with the strike waged by the trade union of the Hyundai Heavy Industries in protest against the authorities' restructuring.
					
					 Speakers said that the coming general strike would demonstrate the people's mindset once again, adding that the Park regime is recklessly enforcing the policy against the workers while going against the people's mindset manifested in the general election.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held in Egypt
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held in Egypt
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung took place in Egypt on July 12.
					 Displayed at the venue of the seminar were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter said the President embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens, achieved the historic cause of national liberation through the bloody anti-Japanese armed struggle and turned the DPRK into a powerful socialist country independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 He is the greatest man who dedicated his whole life to the people's happiness, prosperity of the country and victory of the cause of global independence, the reporter noted, and continued:
					
					 It was one of his greatest exploits that he founded the immortal Juche idea and built a socialist country centred on the popular masses by successfully applying the idea.
					
					 He defeated U.S. and Japanese imperialism in one generation and gave perfect solution to the issue of succession to the leadership.
					
					 His cause was carried forward by HE Kim Jong Il and is being accomplished by HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The speakers praised the servicepersons and people of the DPRK for making miraculous achievements and innovations in building a powerful socialist country under the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Brazilian Politician Speaks Highly of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Brazilian Politician Speaks Highly of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, contributed an article titled "High tribute to Comrade Kim Il Sung, leader and founder of the DPRK" to the newspaper Hora do Povo on July 13 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 July 8 this year marked the 22nd anniversary of demise of the President, the article said, and continued:
					
					 On this occasion not only the Korean people but also the world progressives looked back on the President, founder of the DPRK, and paid tribute to him. 
					
					 The President has been boundlessly respected by progressive mankind for he had won the two rounds of wars against the Japanese and U.S. imperialists.
					
					 He always believed in the people, the driving force of revolution, and enlisted them to build socialist Korea into an independent and powerful country.
					
					 The article referred to the Juche idea and the Songun idea founded by him and great exploits performed by him for the Korean revolution and the cause of human independence. It went on:
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung, the eternal leader of the Korean people, is warmly revered by the world progressives for his bravery and independent spirit.
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the Korean people, who led the anti-imperialist struggle and dealt the first defeat to the imperialists, will always be alive in our hearts.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Election to Top Post of DPRK Celebrated in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Election to Top Post of DPRK Celebrated in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition and film show were held by the Franoson Mannyon International Company LTD of Nigeria, a book exhibition by the Niger Steel Company and a film show at the Bakura Farm of Zamfara State of Nigeria on July 6 and 11, congratulating supreme leader Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 Displayed at the venues of the exhibitions were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were books and photos introducing Juche Korea.
					
					 "Mirae Scientists Street" and other Korean films were shown.

articles.title: Angolan Personages Pay Congratulatory Visit to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Angolan Personages Pay Congratulatory Visit to DPRK Embassy
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Personages of the Youth Organization of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola visited the DPRK Embassy in Luanda on July 6, congratulating Marshal Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 They laid a bouquet before portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The international secretary of the youth organization said that Kim Jong Un's election to the top post of the DPRK is a clear manifestation of the firm faith and will of the Korean people to accomplish the revolutionary cause of the preceding leaders under his guidance. He went on:
					
					 The Korean people and youths led by him would achieve shining victory in the struggle for building a powerful socialist country and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 We will conduct more brisk activities for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people in the future, too.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Praise Kim Jong Un's Feats
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Praise Kim Jong Un's Feats
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The party, army and people of the DPRK will win victory only, meeting all challenges of the U.S. imperialist bellicose forces under the Songun leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 The Swiss preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on July 12 on the 4th anniversary of the conferment of the title of the DPRK Marshal on Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 Thanks to the energetic guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un the DPRK has developed into an invincible power and recorded the ever-victorious history in acute confrontation with the U.S. imperialists for the past four years.
					
					 He has bolstered the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK.
					
					 He set forth the new line of simultaneously developing the two fronts at the historic March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 This year when he was elected to the top posts of the party and state is of great significance in accomplishing the cause of the Songun revolution.
					
					 Rosy is the future of the DPRK holding him in high esteem at the top posts of the party, state and army.
					
					 He will successfully lead prosperous reunified Korea.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Denounce S. Korean Authorities' Decision on THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Denounce S. Korean Authorities' Decision on THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on July 11 in support of the strong warning of the Artillery Bureau of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities finally decided to deploy THAAD for aggression in south Korea despite unanimous opposition and rejection of the DPRK and other countries.
					
					 The deployment poses big threat to the peace of the Korean peninsula, Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 It is just and legitimate for the KPA to take strong physical counteraction to contain THAAD, U.S. means for aggression.
					
					 THAAD deployment in south Korea reveals the U.S. sinister ambition to dominate the world by holding military supremacy in Asia-Pacific.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime decided to deploy THAAD under the pressure of the U.S. This proves that the Park regime is the group of traitors for all ages without an equal in the world.
					
					 We bitterly denounce THAAD deployment in south Korea and fully support the strong warning sent by the Artillery Bureau of the KPA General Staff.

articles.title: Foreign Media Observe Kim Il Sung's Demise Anniversary
articles.content:
Foreign Media Observe Kim Il Sung's Demise Anniversary
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Foreign media carried special write-ups, illustrated with portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.
					 The Iran News on July 3 in an article titled "Father of people" introduced the devoted life of the President who made a long journey of field guidance for the people and children.
					
					 The Indian and World Event on July 2 carried an article praising the whole life of the President who dedicated his all to the people.
					
					 The Malaysian newspaper Guang Ming Daily on June 30 in an article titled "By illuminating the road for independent reunification" lauded Kim Il Sung for laying a solid foundation for the reunification of the country and arousing the entire nation to the drive for achieving it.
					
					 The July issue of the Pakistani internet magazine Global Affairs in an article titled "Eternal sun of Juche" said that he is praised by progressive mankind as the eternal sun of Juche.
					
					 DR Congolese newspaper L'Avenir on July 4 in an article noted that the sunny smile of the President will be everlasting along with the appearance of the DPRK taking on more beautiful looks and making leaps and bounds every day under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Ugandan newspaper Sun Rise on July 8 in an article cited facts that prominent personages of foreign countries are admiring the noble traits of the President.
					
					 The Mozambique newspaper Noticias on July 6 and 8 edited articles on the ideological and theoretical exploits and leadership feats performed by the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced by Austrian Body
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced by Austrian Body
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Go All Out for Victory in the War" was posted by the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK on its website on July 14.
					 The work, a radio speech made by him to all the Korean people on June 26, Juche 39 (1950), deals with the efforts exerted by the DPRK government to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea and lays bare the aim sought by the U.S. imperialists and the Syngman Rhee puppet clique in igniting the war of aggression.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for winning the final victory in the war.
					
					 Posted on it was a portrait of the smiling President.

articles.title: Cancilleria coreana rechaza declaracion presidencial de la 11a cumbre Asia-Europa
articles.content:
Cancilleria coreana rechaza declaracion presidencial de la 11a cumbre Asia-Europa
Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- Dado que en la reciente reunion cumbre Asia-Europa (ASEM), se publico la declaracion presidencial que critica a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz de la cancilleria de esta concedio el dia 17 una entrevista con la ACNC y dio la siguiente respuesta:
					En la 11a reunion cumbre Asia-Europa (ASEM) celebrada el dia 16, se publico la declaracion presidencial que acusa absurdamente a la RPDC describiendo el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear de ella como violacion de las "resoluciones" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y como amenaza para la paz y seguridad de la region y el resto del mundo.
					
					Esto es un acto imprudente que exacerba mas la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana sumandose a la extremada campana de Estados Unidos para presionar a la RPDC.
					
					Hoy dia, EE.UU. es el culpable que crea el peligro de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana y perturba la paz y seguridad de la region y el mundo.
					
					En la actualidad, introduce sin cesar en el Sur de Corea los medios de ataque nuclear estrategicos como los submarinos nucleares y las escuadrillas de bombarderos estrategicos y los armamentos belicos ultramodernos como THAAD y libra los ejercicios militares de caracter agresivo que estan trayendo el nubarron de guerra nuclear.
					
					Al cabo de su intento de atentar contra la soberania y el derecho a la vida de la RPDC, aislarla y asfixiarla, EE.UU. recrudece la campana de sancion y aplastamiento ofendiendo atrevidamente hasta la dignidad de la Direccion Suprema de la primera. 
					
					La RPDC posee el poderoso disuasivo nuclear y lo consolida en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo y esto deviene una justa medida autodefensiva tomada frente a la cada dia mas recrudescente politica hostil y amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					Se torna cada vez mas firme la voluntad del ejercito y pueblo coreanos de rechazar, con resueltas contramedidas intransigentes, el despotismo, las arbitrariedades y la campana de presion militar de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles.
					
					Digan lo que digan otros, la RPDC marchara directo por la invariable ruta de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo y luchara por verificar la verdadera justicia internacional con el poderio de la potencia independiente y la nuclear.

articles.title: Inaugurada Escuela Secundaria de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Inaugurada Escuela Secundaria de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada la Escuela Secundaria de Pyongyang.
					Este plantel tiene el edificio escolar con aulas multifuncionales e informatizadas, laboratorios y salas de practica, el gimnasio donde se puede practicar varios deportes como natacion, el albergue, el edificio de administracion y otros. Se facilitan en el maximo nivel todas las condiciones y el ambiente convenientes al estudio y la vida de los alumnos y a la demanda didactica.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 18 la ceremonia de inauguracion con la participacion de Choe Thae Bok, Kim Su Gil, Kim Sung Du, presidente del Comite de Educacion, Jon Yong Nam, primer secretario del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, Cha Hui Rim, presidente del Comite Popular de la ciudad de Pyongyang, los funcionarios, profesores, empleados y alumnos de la escuela, los funcionarios de los organos del partido y el poder y unidades vinculadas, los trabajadores y los constructores de la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					El discurso de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Su Gil, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Comite del PTC en la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					La Escuela Secundaria de Pyongyang es la cuna y palacio elegante para los huerfanos, levantado gracias al amor paternal del Presidente Kim Jong Un, comenzo el orador y prosiguio:
					
					El Presidente examino personalmente el diseno de la escuela y resolvio todos los problemas que se presentaban en la construccion, de modo que la escuela se edificara como el ejemplar de todo el pais.
					
					Con la conciencia de educador, los profesores y empleados de la escuela deben dedicar todo lo suyo para los alumnos y formarlos como pilares de la Corea prospera, dotados de ricos conocimientos, nobles virtudes y buena salud.
					
					Terminada la ceremonia, los participantes realizaron un recorrido por la escuela.

articles.title: Encuentro de cine por 60o aniversario de visita de Kim Il Sung a Mongolia
articles.content:
Encuentro de cine por 60o aniversario de visita de Kim Il Sung a Mongolia
Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este lunes en el Club para el Cuerpo Diplomatico Taedonggang el encuentro de cine dedicado al 60o aniversario de la visita del Presidente Kim Il Sung a Mongolia. 
					Estuvieron presentes aqui Pak Kyong Il, vicepresidente del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Mongolia, los miembros de esta asociacion y los trabajadores capitalinos. 
					
					Fueron invitados el encargado de negocios a.i. Lombo Khash-Erdene y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica de Mongolia en Corea. 
					
					En la ocasion hubo discursos.
					
					Luego, los participantes vieron la primera parte del documental coreano "Encuentros del Presidente Kim Il Sung con jefes de Estado y personalidades renombradas del extranjero" que transmite las hazanas del lider coreano.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presta mucha atencion a vida de veteranos de guerra
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presta mucha atencion a vida de veteranos de guerra
Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- Al pie del pintoresco monte Ryong-ak esta construyendose la casa de reposo para los veteranos de guerra de Pyongyang, dispuesta de la piscina, la peluqueria, el bano, las salas de masaje, gimnasia, juegos  recreativos y de tratamiento medico.
					Gracias a la calida benevolencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea que considera a los veteranos de guerra como tesoros valiosos del pais, se levantaran tales casas de reposo en todas las provincias del pais.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il dijo que estimar a los veteranos de guerra constituye la tradicion de nuestra revolucion, que ha venido triunfando apoyandose en las fuerzas armadas, y un buen ambiente espiritual y moral de nuestra sociedad, y les hizo disfrutarse de la vida orgullosa.
					
					Tambien, convoco la conferencia nacional de veteranos de guerra, hizo que los Heroes de combate de la Republica trabajaran como conferenciantes del Museo Conmemorativo de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y participaran en los desfiles militares efectuados con motivo de las fiestas nacionales.
					
					Gracias a la sabia direccion del Dirigente, se reina en la sociedad coreana el ambiente de tratar con preferencia a los veteranos de guerra y atenderlos para que ellos no tengan dificultades en la vida.
					
					Hoy en dia, el Presidente Kim Jong Un cuida con atencion a los veteranos de guerra diciendo que estos son soldados heroes y precursores de la revolucion que defendieron con sangre la patria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					
					Hizo celebrar con solemnidad el 27 de julio de cada ano como fiesta de triunfadores, presencio la funcion artistica junto con los veteranos participantes en las conferencias y tomo fotos de recuerdo junto con ellos.
					
					Hizo remodelar el Museo Conmemorativo de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y construir el Cementerio de Martires de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria como creaciones monumentales para que se herede el espiritu combativo manifestado por los soldados valientes del Ejercito Popular de Corea durante la enconada guerra.
					
					En el regazo del Presidente brillaran de generacion en generacion la vida y meritos de los veteranos de guerra.
